author: pan_ilford
post_text: February 7, 2019 at 7:57 PM#1HelloI would like to switch two channels' dimmer levels through the whole sequence, so the patch could stay 1:1. Thank you

posts.author: pan_ilford
posts.post_text: February 7, 2019 at 7:57 PM#1HelloI would like to switch two channels' dimmer levels through the whole sequence, so the patch could stay 1:1. Thank you

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: February 7, 2019 at 9:20 PM#2you cannot directly swap two channels. [color=#FF0000]A[/color] [color=#336600]B[/color] -> [color=#336600]A[/color] [color=#FF0000]B[/color]however if you use an extra new or existing unused channel you can do this with a 3 step operationAssuming the channels to switch is A & B, and the extra channel is C:[color=#FF0000]A[/color] [color=#336600]B[/color] CReplace Channel A With C-> A [color=#336600]B[/color] [color=#FF0000]C[/color]Replace Channel B With A-> [color=#336600]A[/color] B [color=#FF0000]C[/color]Replace Channel C With B-> [color=#336600]A[/color] [color=#FF0000]B[/color] C[color=#FF0000]A[/color] [color=#336600]B[/color] C -> [color=#336600]A[/color] [color=#FF0000]B[/color] C

title: Switching channels in a sequence
